mapper.insert: insert into TF_EL_MESSAGE ( MESSAGE_ID, MESSAGE_TYPE, MASSAGE_CONTENT, MESSAGE_TIME, USER_ID, EXTEND1, EXTEND2, EXTEND3, EXTEND4 ) values ( SEQ_EL_MESSAGE.nextval, #{messageType}, #{messageContent}, #{messageTime}, #{userId}, #{extend1}, #{extend2}, #{extend3}, #{extend4} )
mapper.select: select * from tf_el_message t where t.USER_ID = #{userId} and t.IS_READ = '0' order by to_char(to_date(t.message_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'),'yyyyMMddHH24miss') desc
mapper.update: update tf_el_message t set t.IS_READ = '1' where t.USER_ID = #{userId} and t.MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId}
mapper.insert: insert into tf_el_message(message_id,message_type,massage_content,message_time,user_id,IS_POPUP) select SEQ_EL_MESSAGE.nextval, #{messageType}, #{messageContent}, #{messageTime}, t.user_id, #{isPopUp} from tf_el_teach_user t
mapper.select: select * from tf_el_message where user_id = #{userId} and IS_POPUP = '1' and IS_READ = '0'
